#summary How to use Core Framework in your projects?

= Installation =

Core Framework is easy to use. All you need is to include it in your projects.

{{{
<script type="text/javascript" src=""http://core-framework.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/core.js"></script>
}}}

== Local copy ==
If you want to have Core Framework as local file, copy http://core-framework.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/core.js contents somewhere on your file system and include it in your project.
